channel.title: Login, Follow,
channel.description:
i need help with a few things.
1. Changing login spot - i loged on a new acc and got the coords and couldnt find in player.java or playerhandler.java
2. Fixing Noclip when following
3. Making a ::lottery command that you add 10M and get a random item
4. changing the shops Buy 10 option to buy 50.. and possible make it say Buy 50 instead of 10?

item.title: Login, Follow,
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

I think it depends on the server because the first log-in details are in either player.java or playerhandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Login, Follow,
item.dc:creator: @toomuchmopar toomuchmopar
item.description:
@toomuchmopar wrote:

Client folder > Characters > donttouch.txt, just edit the coords. this is just for base moparscape.

Read full topic
